title: Bethenny Frankel posts bizarre photo of 9 year old daughter holding up her breasts
text:

TV personality Bethenny Frankel has posted a photo of her nine-year-old daughter holding her breasts to help promote her mum's shapewear line.

Bethenny, 48, uploaded the picture to her Instagram account where she has 2.1million followers.

Smiling for the camera, she poses in her shapewear line while her daughter Bryn holds up her breasts from behind.

(Image: Instagram)

Bethenny captioned the post "I have all the support I need (hands not included with purchase)".

"Get #skinnygirlshapewear to feel supported AND sexy!"

After lots of promotional hashtags for her Shapewear line, Bethenny also reminded her followers to get a mammogram.

Her fans were delighted by the photo, with one calling the pair "Mom & Daughter goals"

"Hahahaha, so cute!" said another.

(Image: Getty Images North America)

"So adorable" said a third.

Her followers also thanked Bethenny for raising awareness about checking your breasts.

One wrote: "I’m hoping a celebrity like you can influence someone and help save a life. And don’t forget to do your self breast exam."

"LOVE THIS! So many girls aren’t taught to be self-aware", added another.

Bethenny shares her daughter with her estranged Jason Hoppy - who she has a restraining order against.

In 2017, she sued for full custody of their daughter.

(Image: Instagram)

Bethenny then dated businessman Dennis Shields until his sudden death in his Trump Tower apartment in August 2018.

It was reported he died from an accidental drug overdose.

She is currently dating film producer and real estate executive Paul Bernon, and the pair attended a wedding together earlier this week.

Smitten Bethenny posted a photo of her and her boyfriend suited and booted for the ceremony, with the caption "Love is in the air".
description: Bethenny's daughter Bryn was helping her mum plug Skinnygirl Shapewear
